greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: order of all-2s configuration on the n X k sandpile grid graph.
comment: It seems that T(2*k, 2) = A195549(k); true at least up to k = 16. If there was column 1, then T(k, 1) would seem to coincide with A005246(k+2). - _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Jul 21 2018
link: Laura Florescu, Daniela Morar, David Perkinson, Nicholas Salter, Tianyuan Xu, Sandpiles and Dominos, Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, Volume 22(1), 2015.
xref: Main diagonal gives A256046, A256043, and A256047.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 15 2015
